ids:contractDocument.ids:description: IDS DATA USAGE CONTRACT nbetween http://example.com/party/provider and http://example.com/party/consumer for http://example.com/ids-data/resourcennTERMS OF USEnThis Data Licence Agreement is intended for use within an IDS Connector provided by the IDSA.nThe Data Consumer is entitled to use the Data http://example.com/ids-data/resource as follows:n* Local logging: The Data Consumer must log data access to the following extent: MINIMAL. It must provide these logs to the Data Provider upon request.n* Allowed use: Data use is only permitted in the following manner: USE.n* Location-restricted: Data use is only permitted in certain locations: Dortmund.nnTERM AND TERMINATIONn* The contract begins on 2021-10-01 and has a limited term until 2022-03-01.nnREGULAR REMUNERATIONn* The data is provided for free.nnThe transfer for use is - subject to further agreements - limited to these types of use.nSigned: 2021-10-19T11:26:59.000+02:00   http://example.com/party/provider   http://example.com/party/consumer
